name: Odyssey (cellochica, Eliah Smith)
description:
ODYSSEY DESCRIPTION

Embark on a rogue-lite hack-and-slash dungeon crawler based on Homer's epic poem, Odyssey.

Wield the powers and mythic weapons of Greek mythology to break free from the clutches of Poseidon, God of the sea himself, while growing stronger and unraveling more of the Ulysses' journey with each unique attempt.

YouTube Channel

FEATURES
  • Third-person rogue-lite action RPG
  • Progress through Greek Mythology world and defeat all enemies along the way
  • Defy death and hack & slash your journey back home!
FACTSHEET Developer:

Cécile Roux  & Eliah Smith

Development & date:

Unity | 2021

Platforms:

Windows with Xbox Controller or Keyboard

Audience:

12+

HISTORY

This game has been developed over 10 weeks in Unity by one designer and one programmer. It was originally intended for Sony PlayStation® platform but is now available for Windows. And while it is still in its early stage of development, we hope that you will still enjoy the journey!

  • Unity Packages:           Heparo | Staggart Creations | Render Knight
  • Trailer Template:         Ruslan Ivanov > Epic Trailer - Darkness 
CONTACT

HIGHLIGHTS

Odyssey was selected to be showcased by Billy Blue College of Design 2021 games Twitch.TV
